verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] spent more in taxpayer dollars on his frequent trips to his Mar - a - Lago resort in Florida than special counsel Robert Mueller 's office has spent on the Russia investigation so far . The president has repeatedly attacked the Mueller probe for racking up millions of dollars in expenditures , doing so most recen ...
